M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.mygdx.game.desktop.DesktopLauncher
Creates a new window with the specified title, size and behaviour parameters before assigning a fresh game-state to it, which is managed by the Main() class and all classes recursively spawned by it
Main - Class in com.mygdx.game
 
Main() - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.Main
Class constructor that instantiates a game-state for the very first time
MainMenu - Class in com.mygdx.game
 
MainMenu(Game) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.MainMenu
The menu-screen's initial constructor
market() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Returns all of the data pertaining to the game's market, which is declared and managed by the engine
Market - Class in com.mygdx.game
 
Market(Game, GameEngine) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.Market
Constructs the market by calculating buying/selling costs and arranging the associated visual interface Imports the game's state (for direct renderer access) and the engine which controls it, before setting up the functions and visual features of its internal purchase/sale buttons and populating a drawable visual framework with them and some other stock/identification labels
MarketTest - Class in <Unnamed>
 
MarketTest() - Constructor for class MarketTest
 
minutes() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameTimer
Returns the number of minutes currently clocked on the timer
